instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan turn on immediately full
threads.message: I have a MacBook Air 13 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> board that had 3 beep ram error. After reflow of the ram , now cpu gets hot but doesn't chime. When I plus in charger to board it doesn't do common on/off cycles before chime but it start immediately with full speed fan.    Cpu gets hot but no chime?   What could be? What should I measure in this case?  Thanks you in advance

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> fan turn on immediately full
threads.message: Bad RAM, CPU or cracked traces. 3 beep air boards are pretty much trash.
